name: Move the Fish - Arcade Fish On The Run
name_original: Move the Fish - Arcade Fish On The Run
description:
Move the fish across the sea!

See how far you can get without being eaten by sharks, whales, alligators, and piranhas
____________________________________________

Arcade style gameplay with HD graphics.
____________________________________________

Move the fish forward to dodge the hungry predators while collecting coins.

Endless gameplay to see how high you can score.

Challenge a friend to see who can get the highest score!

For more latest news and updates on #MoveTheFish, follow us here:
